summary: This document outlines the terms of the Butterfly Trust established by Jeffrey E. Epstein, naming Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn as trustees. It details the powers of the trustees, the conditions for adding beneficiaries, and the irrevocability of the trust. The document also specifies the governing law and the conditions under which the trust may be terminated.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the creator of the Butterfly Trust and has transferred property to the trustees.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is one of the trustees of the Butterfly Trust, responsible for managing the trust's assets.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn serves as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust alongside Darren K. Indyke.

persons.name: Ghislaine N. Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the trust, with the trustees having the discretion to distribute trust assets to her.

persons.name: Harry I. Beller
persons.context: Harry I. Beller is the notary public who witnessed the signing of the trust agreement.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein appointed Darren K. Indyke as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Jeffrey E. Epstein appointed Richard Kahn as a trustee of the Butterfly Trust.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn serve together as trustees of the Butterfly Trust.
Darren K. Indyke has the authority to distribute trust assets to Ghislaine N. Maxwell as a potential beneficiary.
Richard Kahn has the authority to distribute trust assets to Ghislaine N. Maxwell as a potential beneficiary.

events.title: Establishment of Butterfly Trust
events.description: The Butterfly Trust was established by Jeffrey E. Epstein, with Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn appointed as trustees.

events.title: Addition of Beneficiary
events.description: Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn, as trustees, added a new beneficiary to the Butterfly Trust.

keyFacts: The Butterfly Trust was established on December 21, 2006, by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Darren K. Indyke and Richard Kahn are named as trustees of the trust.
Ghislaine N. Maxwell is mentioned as a potential beneficiary of the trust.
The trust is irrevocable and governed by the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The trustees have complete discretion over the distribution of trust assets.
